title: The Tenant
medium: oil, canvas, black linoleum, and cement on canvas
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Conrad Marca-Relli [1913-2000]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1955 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 182 (illustrated, plate 66) in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. In the exhibition catalogue the artist's name is given as Corrado Marca-Relli. 
[2]. The painting was purchased (through the Stable Gallery, New York, NY) from the International for Carnegie Institute at the suggestion of and with funds provided by Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA.
